title: Govinda Restaurante e Pizzaria Vegetariana
typeOfFood: Lacto, Pizza, Indian, Western, Buffet, Salad bar, Brazilian
description: Operating since 1997 this is a casual, lacto-vegetarian restaurant offering daytime all-you-can-eat buffet with salads, rice, dahl, and a variety of hot dishes. In the evenings from Thursday to Saturday, it serves pizzas, crepes, gnocchi, and lacto vegetarian snackes à la carte. Use ghee butter in some cooking. Location is in front of Farroupilha Park (Redenção). Seats up to 90.
